hero.subtitle: Kullanıma hazır bento grid tasarımları. Bir sonraki projenize kopyalayıp yapıştırmanız yeterli. HTML, CSS ve Tailwind CSS ile hazırlanmıştır.

seo.title: Bentoed - 30'dan Fazla Bento Grid Bileşeni
seo.description: HTML, CSS ve Tailwind CSS ile hazırlanmış 30'dan fazla ücretsiz bento grid tasarımını keşfedin. Galeriler, portfolyolar, bloglar ve daha fazlası için kopyala-yapıştır bileşenler.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Bentoed collects, uses, and protects your information when you visit our website. We are committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: When you visit our website, we may collect the following types of information:
dataCollection.item1: Technical information including your IP address, browser type, and operating system
dataCollection.item2: Usage data such as pages visited, time spent on pages, and click patterns
dataCollection.item3: Cookie data and similar tracking technologies

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience and analyze site traffic. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us understand how you use our website.

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies:
analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website

preference.name: Preference Cookies:
preference.desc: Remember your settings and preferences (language, theme)

googleAdsense.title: Google AdSense and Third-Party Cookies
googleAdsense.content: This website uses Google AdSense, a service for including advertisements from Google Inc. ("Google"). Google AdSense uses cookies and web beacons to display advertisements based on your previous visits to this website or other websites.
googleAdsense.dataUsage: Google uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites. Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads based on your visit to our sites and/or other sites on the Internet.
googleAdsense.optOut: You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google's Ads Settings at

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information to:
dataUsage.item1: Improve our website's functionality and user experience
dataUsage.item2: Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
dataUsage.item3: Display relevant advertisements through Google AdSense

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.item1: Access the personal information we hold about you
userRights.item3: Request deletion of your personal information
userRights.item5: Disable cookies through your browser settings

cookieManagement.title: Managing Cookies
cookieManagement.content: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Please note that removing or blocking cookies may impact your user experience and some functionality may no longer be available.
cookieManagement.browserSettings: Most browsers allow you to refuse or accept cookies. You can usually find these settings in your browser's "Options" or "Preferences" menu.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Analytics and cookie data are typically retained for up to 26 months.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites and services, including Google AdSense. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact:

footer.compliance: This privacy policy is compliant with GDPR, CCPA, and Google AdSense requirements.
